title: dotFile
description: A decade-long macOS automation and setup guide for developers. Includes shell scripts, package installers, and extensive documentation to streamline your Mac setup from zero to hero.

title: CountByAlexa
description: A Flask-Ask-powered Alexa skill built in 2019 for skip counting. Designed as a template for developers to create extensible voice applications. Featured on the Alexa Marketplace.

title: chess_engine
description: Hackathon-winning project that reimagines legacy PL/SQL as a modern stack. Built in 2 days using Claude + OpenAI to automate logic extraction and conversion. Fast, fun, and functional.

title: fraudml
description: A Flask-based ML app built during a code interview in 2019. Features a trained model, Google Cloud deployment, Dockerization, CI/CD pipelines, and pre-Agent era devops rigor.

title: ExpressApi
description: Serverless REST API boilerplate built in 2017 with Node.js, Express, and DynamoDB. Deployed via Claudia.js to AWS Lambda and API Gateway. A lightweight, production-ready foundation.

title: BlueInk Remover
description: A utility script likely involving image processing to remove specific color casts (e.g., blue ink from scanned documents).
